1:
I will lift up my eyes to the mountains.\q From where will my help come?
\q
2:
My help comes from Yahweh,\q who made heaven and earth.


\q
3:
He will not allow your foot to slip;\q he who protects you will not slumber.
\q
4:
See, the guardian of Israel\q never slumbers or sleeps.


\q
5:
Yahweh is your guardian;\q Yahweh is the shade at your right hand.
\q
6:
The sun will not harm you by day,\q nor the moon by night.


\q
7:
Yahweh will protect you from all harm,\q and he will protect your life.
\q
8: Yahweh will protect you in all you do\q now and forevermore.
